trans-unit.source: Represents a set of alternatives in the constraints of a speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et sett med alternativer i begrensningene for en tale recognition grammatikk.

trans-unit.source: A Choices object represents a component of a phrase that can have one of several values.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt for valg representerer en komponent i et uttrykk som kan ha flere verdier.

trans-unit.source: Use this class when creating a speech recognition grammar from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne klassen når du oppretter en tale recognition grammatikk fra en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>objektet.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: For example, a Choices object could represent the component *colorChoice* in the phrase, "Change the color to *colorChoice*", where acceptable values for *colorChoice* are “red”, or “green”, or “blue”.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel et valg-objekt kan representere komponenten *colorChoice* i uttrykket, "endre fargen som *colorChoice*", der akseptable verdier for *colorChoice* er "red" eller "grønn" eller "blue".

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To use a Choices object as an optional component in a phrase, create the Choices object and add it to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName> object with `minRepeat` and `maxRepeat` set to 0 and 1, respectively.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For å bruke et valg-objekt som en valgfri komponent i et uttrykk, opprette valg-objektet og legge den til en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName>objekt med `minRepeat` og `maxRepeat` satt til 0 og 1, henholdsvis.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%28System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Phrases containing optional components can be recognized whether or not the optional component is spoken.
trans-unit.target: Uttrykk som inneholder valgfrie komponenter kan gjenkjennes hvorvidt valgfri komponent data.

trans-unit.source: The Choices class serves the same function as the `one-of` XML element defined by the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/) and is similar to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> class in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Klassen valg betjener samme funksjon som den `one-of` XML-elementet er definert av den [tale Recognition grammatikk spesifikasjonen (SRGS) versjon 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/) og er lik den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>klasse i den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar>navneområde.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>

trans-unit.source: For more information about defining a speech recognition grammar, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) and [Creating GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om hvordan du definerer en tale recognition grammatikk [talegjenkjenning](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919) og [oppretter GrammarBuilder Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"></xref> class that contains an empty set of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"> </xref> klassen som inneholder et tomt sett med alternativer.

trans-unit.source: This constructor returns a valid, empty set of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren returnerer et gyldig tomt sett med alternativer.

trans-unit.source: You can add alternatives using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices.Add%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til alternativer med noen av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices.Add%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"></xref> class from an array containing one or more <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"> </xref> klassen fra en matrise som inneholder ett eller flere <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> objekter.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> in `alternateChoices` defines one alternative.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>i `alternateChoices` definerer en alternativ.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: If `alternateChoices` is an empty array, the constructor returns an empty set of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `alternateChoices` er en tom matrise konstruktøren returnerer et tomt sett med alternativer.

trans-unit.source: You can add alternatives using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices.Add%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til alternativer med noen av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices.Add%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The constructor throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> when `alternateChoices` is `null` or when any of the array elements are `null`.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren oppstår en <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>når `alternateChoices` er `null` eller når noen av elementene i matrisen `null`.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> class provides support for implicit conversion of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> objects to <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instances, by properly using casts, this constructor can also be used to create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> object from a list of any combination of these objects.
trans-unit.target: Fordi den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>klassen gir støtte for implisitt konvertering av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue>, og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey>objekter til <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>tilfeller via riktig overførte møter, kan denne konstruktøren også brukes til å opprette en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices>objektet fra en liste over en kombinasjon av disse objektene.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultKey> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SemanticResultValue> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: An array containing the set of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: En matrise som inneholder alternativene.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"></xref> class from an array containing one or more <xref:System.String> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"> </xref> klassen fra en matrise som inneholder ett eller flere <xref:System.String>objekter.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.String> in `phrases` defines one alternative.
trans-unit.target: Hver <xref:System.String>i `phrases` definerer en alternativ.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engine can use any one of the items in the string array to match speech input.
trans-unit.target: Motor for talegjenkjenning kan bruke ett av elementene i matrisen streng som samsvarer med taleinndata.

trans-unit.source: If `phrases` is an empty array, the constructor returns an empty set of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `phrases` er en tom matrise konstruktøren returnerer et tomt sett med alternativer.

trans-unit.source: You can add alternatives using any of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices.Add%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Du kan legge til alternativer med noen av de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices.Add%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: The constructor throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> when `phrases` is `null` or any of the array elements are `null`.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren oppstår en <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>når `phrases` er `null` eller noen av elementene i matrisen er `null`.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: The constructor throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> if any element in the array is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren oppstår en <xref:System.ArgumentException>om alle elementer i matrisen er en tom streng ("").</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: An array containing the set of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: En matrise som inneholder alternativene.

trans-unit.source: Adds an array containing one or more <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> objects to the set of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en matrise som inneholder ett eller flere <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> objektene alternativene.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> objects to add to this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> som skal legges til i denne <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Adds an array containing one or more <xref:System.String> objects to the set of alternatives.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en matrise som inneholder ett eller flere <xref:System.String>objektene alternativene.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The strings to add to this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Strenger for å legge til dette <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> object from this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> objektet fra dette <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> returned by this method is equivalent to one returned by either of the following.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>returnert av denne metoden tilsvarer en returneres av en av følgende.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: - Calling the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%2A> constructor with this object as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: -Kaller den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør med dette objektet som parameter.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Using the implicit or explicit cast of this object to a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: -Bruker implisitt eller eksplisitt endringen for dette objektet til <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"></xref> that matches this <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder"> </xref> som samsvarer med dette <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Choices"> </xref> objektet.
